resources.string: Moto Responder turned on
If you will not read a message or not receive an answer, application will try to determine if you are currently riding, and if yes, it will send automatical response.
Application process will not work in background, automatical responses will not be sent.
Answer to SMS
Application will answer to unread SMSes.
Application will ignore unread SMSes.
Template of automatical answer to SMS
This text will be used as template for automatical response to SMS, when you are riding on a motorcycle.
Answer to calls
Application will answer to unanswered calls, when you are riding on a motorcycle.
Application will ignore unanswered calls.
Template of automatical answer to call
This text will be used as template for automatical response to unanswered call, when you are riding on a motorcycle.
Share location request
When application will receive request for sharing your location, it will send a SMS with link to google map with your location marked on it.
Application will treat request for sharing your location as any other incoming SMS, and will not share your location with anyone.
Template of location request answer.

This text will be used as template, for automatical response with your location, when you are riding a motorcycle. This template should have tag "%location%", in this place will be placed link to the map.
Ongoing notifications
Application will show notification about ongoing processes, for example when measuring if you are riding, or when you will set app to riding mode.
Application will not display any ongoing notifications.
Summary notification
Application will show notification when it will send automatical response.
Application will not show any notification about automatical response.
Location request pattern #1
If this pattern will be found in incoming SMS message, it will be treat as location request.
Debug notification
Application will show detailed notification about all conditions which influenced decision about responding or not responding to call/SMS. It\'s useful for debug, or adjusting settings.
Application will not show debug notification. Good for normal usage of application.
Location request pattern #2
Additional request pattern.
